description.en: iCKB is a decentralized application on Nervos Network's CKB, enhancing the Nervos DAO by offering a liquid staking token. It allows users to convert CKB to iCKB, representing Nervos DAO deposits, enabling fast withdrawals without the standard 30-day lockup. Supporting wallets like JoyID and Neuron, iCKB maintains security through audited L1 scripts and provides flexibility for DeFi integration. Future plans include expanding ecosystem compatibility and user adoption.
description.ch: iCKB 是 Nervos 网络 CKB 上的去中心化应用程序，通过提供流动性质押代币来增强 Nervos DAO。它允许用户将 CKB 转换为 iCKB，代表 Nervos DAO 存款，无需标准的 30 天锁定期即可快速提取。支持 JoyID 和 Neuron 等钱包，iCKB 通过经过审计的 L1 脚本保持安全性，并为 DeFi 集成提供灵活性。未来计划包括扩展生态系统兼容性和用户采用。

description.en: Designed to expand compatibility with DeFi protocols, fostering broader adoption and utility within the Nervos ecosystem
description.ch: 旨在扩展与 DeFi 协议的兼容性，促进 Nervos 生态系统内更广泛的采用和实用性

description.en: Enables users to convert CKB into a liquid staking token, representing Nervos DAO deposits, for flexible asset management
description.ch: 使用户能够将 CKB 转换为流动性质押代币，代表 Nervos DAO 存款，实现灵活的资产管理

description.en: Users can withdraw iCKB instantly, bypassing the standard 30-day lockup period required by Nervos DAO
description.ch: 用户可以立即提取 iCKB，绕过 Nervos DAO 要求的标准 30 天锁定期

desc.en: NervDao is a dApp on Nervos CKB, streamlining Nervos DAO interaction
desc.ch: NervDAO 是 Nervos CKB 上的去中心化应用，简化 Nervos DAO 交互

a.en: Users convert CKB to iCKB, enabling instant withdrawals from Nervos DAO without the standard 30-day lockup.
a.ch: 用户将 CKB 转换为 iCKB，无需标准的 30 天锁定期即可从 Nervos DAO 即时提取。

a.en: Yes, iCKB uses audited Layer 1 scripts on CKB to ensure robust security for transactions and assets.
a.ch: 是的，iCKB 使用 CKB 上经过审计的第一层脚本确保交易和资产的强大安全性。

q.en: Can iCKB be used in DeFi?
q.ch: iCKB 可以用于 DeFi 吗？

a.ch: iCKB 旨在支持 DeFi 集成，计划扩展兼容性以供更广泛的生态系统使用。
